thread.section_title: American RV Company Reviews | Customer Service Reviews of American RV Company | www.americanrvcompany.com
thread.title: Jeff Holt
thread.title_full: American RV Company reviewed by Jeff Holt

author: Jeff Holt
title: Jeff Holt
text:
Ordered an awning & an arm. Both came quickly and in good condition. Sales staff when I ordered were awesome. Web site is difficult to navigate and know exactly what you are ordering is what you really want. ie: the arm I ordered was too long, but not a problem, I could shorten it.
The only thing that was really off on this order was I ordered a 15' awning, what I got was 14'6". Six inches too short, but will work.
